Author: Junko Yoshida
Article: I arrived in Shenzhen for the Global CEO Summit two days early last week so I could spend time with a local friend I had not seen since my last trip here in 2016. My friend started her career as an engineer in China and is now on a business development/management track at a technology company based in Shanghai and Silicon Valley.
